title: Prevailing rainy conditions expected to reduce from today
byline: The prevailing rainy conditions are expected to reduce from today (23) as the low-pressure area over the southwest Bay of Bengal moves away from the island, the Department of Meteorology Said.

title: Strong quake hits off Malaysia’s Sabah
byline: A strong 7.1-magnitude quake struck early on Monday (Feb 23) off Malaysia’s Sabah state on Borneo island, US seismologists said.

title: ‘One Battle After Another’ wins big at Britain’s BAFTA film awards
byline: Dark comedy “One Battle After Another” was the big winner at Britain’s top movie awards on Sunday, picking up six BAFTAs including best film and best director for Paul Thomas Anderson.
